title: Weekly Digest (26 January, 2020 - 2 February, 2020)
body:
Here's the **Weekly Digest** for [*status-im/status-react*](https://github.com/status-im/status-react):

 - - - 
# ISSUES
Last week 44 issues were created.
Of these, 16 issues have been closed and 28 issues are still open.
## OPEN ISSUES
:green_heart: #9961 [Update glossary view](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9961), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #9960 [Resolve ENS names in the background](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9960), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:green_heart: #9958 [[#9954] Add 'view profile' to message long tap](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9958), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #9957 [[DONT MERGE]Temporary hide spinners for v1](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9957), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #9956 [Sometimes spinner is shown for every sent message](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9956), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #9955 [Slight change of the "generate a new account" flow](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9955), by [andmironov](https://github.com/andmironov)
:green_heart: #9954 [Add 'view profile' to message long tap](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9954), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:green_heart: #9953 [Offload out-of-view messages to protect UI performance](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9953), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:green_heart: #9952 [fixes ENS to new registry](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9952), by [decanus](https://github.com/decanus)
:green_heart: #9950 [attempt to fix #9942](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9950), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:green_heart: #9949 [[WIP] Enable waku](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9949), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:green_heart: #9948 [Allow dismissing chat's input by dragging it downward](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9948), by [errorists](https://github.com/errorists)
:green_heart: #9947 [Failed to create database after upgrading ios app](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9947), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #9945 [WIP Rework and update react-navigation](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9945), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:green_heart: #9943 [App is trying to reconnect spontaneously to 3 mailservers in the cycle it might take up to 30 sec](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9943), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #9941 [improvement on snackbar by considering login time](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9941), by [tbenr](https://github.com/tbenr)
:green_heart: #9940 [Pass extra argument to handle multiaccounts on logout](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9940), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:green_heart: #9939 [Fixes cryptokitties loading/ordering](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9939), by [krzyzowiec](https://github.com/krzyzowiec)
:green_heart: #9938 [Change iOS modal presentation to Stacks](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9938), by [errorists](https://github.com/errorists)
:green_heart: #9937 [Introduce custom touchable animation with haptic feedback](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9937), by [errorists](https://github.com/errorists)
:green_heart: #9933 [Update your keys screen](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9933), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:green_heart: #9932 [[WIP] Remove unused translatins](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9932), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:green_heart: #9931 [Allow 2 lines for user name on intro screen](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9931), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:green_heart: #9929 [Messages don't appear in 1-1 chat](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9929), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #9928 [Endless spinner  for messages status](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9928), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #9924 [Clarify wallet 'send' button](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9924), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:green_heart: #9922 [Fix ens names in chat](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9922), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:green_heart: #9918 [WIP: added the loading spinner animation, but haven't implemented theâ€¦](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9918), by [alexjg](https://github.com/alexjg)
## CLOSED ISSUES

:heart: #9942 [[#9927] Fast blocks sync after being offline](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9942), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)

:heart: #9935 [Correctly dispatch on updates & disable them](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9935), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)

:heart: #9930 [Its not possible to send messages when you have endless blue line loading indicator at the top](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9930), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #9927 [Transaction history is delayed in status](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9927), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #9926 [Disable editprofile tests](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9926), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:heart: #9925 [fix #9903 hide buttons of actions that are not yet implemented](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9925), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:heart: #9923 [add Augur token (REP) images](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9923), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:heart: #9921 [Fix e2e after removed custom pic](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9921), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:heart: #9920 [Add REP logo for wallet asset](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9920), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:heart: #9919 [[Fixes: #9900] Use component-did-update](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9919), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
## LIKED ISSUE
:+1: #9942 [[#9927] Fast blocks sync after being offline](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9942), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
It received :+1: x1, :smile: x0, :tada: x0 and :heart: x1.
## NOISY ISSUE
:speaker: #9942 [[#9927] Fast blocks sync after being offline](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9942), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
It received 12 comments.

 - - - 
# PULL REQUESTS
Last week, 44 pull requests were created, updated or merged.
## UPDATED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 25 pull requests were updated.

## MERGED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 19 pull requests were merged.

 - - - 
# COMMITS
Last week there were 19 commits.
:hammer_and_wrench: [Git ignore trace.edn and config.cljs  They are auto generated and should not be present in git  Signed-off-by: Gheorghe Pinzaru <feross95@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/785f829554d1e3e9e0b2bb44bae8c6b86cbc8468) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Remove contact indicator from userpic  Add contact indicator in 1:1 as a text. Fixes #9826  Fix e2e  explicitly define line height  On android and iOs line height is different, explicitly define so it will be the same in both platforms.  Signed-off-by: Gheorghe Pinzaru <feross95@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/47732e7b5b5e5e27920714111c0cbb438784eba9) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:hammer_and_wrench: [fix hardcoded value in spanish translation  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/b2feca723c2119a06ca5a3e76b0941bee01070f4) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [fix #9903 hide buttons of actions that are not yet implemented  fix ens release button which showed a hardcoded date link to release instructions on hackmd  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/cc3ae6c693d812fde69edda1ee6a6acdf4c98344) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#9927] Fast blocks sync after being offline  Front end changes:  As there is no guarantee that `newblock` event will be dispatched consequently (e.g. if there was a delay after block#1 the next event might be dispatched for a block#2000, no guarantee that block#2 will be the next one), `newTransactions` field was added with a map of accounts to the number of new transactions received to this block. In result if there are new transactions we request them all of db instead of fetching them on for the block specified in `newblock` event, as it was done previously.  Back end changes: - In order to avoid handling of the reorganized blocks we use an offset from the latest known block when start listening to new blocks. Before this commit the offset was 15 blocks for all networks. This offset is too big for mainnet and causes noticeable delay of marking a transfer as confirmed in Status (comparing to etherscan). So it was changed to be 5 blocks on mainnet and is still 15 blocks on other networks. - Also before this commit all new blocks were handled one by one with network specific interval (10s for mainnet), which means that in case of lost internet connection or application suspension (happens on iOS) receiving of new blocks would be paused and then resumed with the same "speed" - 1 blocks per 10s. In case if that pause is big enough the application would never catch up with the latest block in the network, and this also causes the state of transfers to be delayed in the application. In this commit in case if there was more than 40s delay after receiving of the previous block the whole history in range between the previous received block and ("latest"-reorgeSafetyDepth) block is checked at once and app catches up with a recent state of the chain.](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/b41df2f2fcb0fdb5043a52f77d820926b6ab2139) by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:hammer_and_wrench: [update Italian, Arabic, Spanish(LatAm), Chinese and Korean  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/58afae07ba5199b3d140d23fbb0a5824cc688fe3) by [jinhojang6](https://github.com/jinhojang6)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Explicitly start messenger  We should only start receiving messages/processing topics once all the initializiation is completed, so an endpoint that start the messenger has been added. Before we would initialize the topics/receiving messages at the same time, which resulted in a race condition where a topic was signaled from status-go and was considered new just because was not loaded yet.  Signed-off-by: Andrea Maria Piana <andrea.maria.piana@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/6ff878c83615029895cbd4cfce537fb0a8ca3515) by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:hammer_and_wrench: [fastlane: disable oldest_build_allowed for TestFlight clean  Signed-off-by: Jakub SokoÅ‚owski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/128f44f58b8520af911a34ad89417f6dca502488) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Disable editprofile tests  Signed-off-by: Serhy <sergii@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/9fb513cea09d66ff9c38e868ddf5f64da66e45d8) by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Correctly dispatch on updates & disable them  Signed-off-by: Andrea Maria Piana <andrea.maria.piana@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/a64eb79065018617c99867e714685414db2ea881) by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#9280] Make sure number-of-retries is not negative](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/9dfb90867807ba53a62d71fc27780d9e2b134935) by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:hammer_and_wrench: [  Support universal link for ens name  Handle ens-name in qr reader  If user has an username generate link with it  Ensure no infinite recursion happens on qr scan event  Fix test for custom profile ens-name  Fix QR code read for ens-name  Extra check for ens name in QR code  Do not open unknown profile for bad ens name  Signed-off-by: Gheorghe Pinzaru <feross95@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/028543aa31114320514dee0ae593d1dc9f104c79) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:hammer_and_wrench: [add Augur token (REP) images  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/60af04ff069d945fe3d3e962768fea979f09b246) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Fix e2e after removed custom pic  Signed-off-by: Serhy <sergii@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/5203fc6fd81012bd49f337526541a5d7c08f1180) by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[Fixes: #9900] Use component-did-update  When moving from chat to chat, component-did-mount is not fired as the component is never unmounted, therefore messages were not loaded. This changes the behavior to use the component-did-update lifecycle method.  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/238b55998120314e5a9005faafd4046ed820cdd7) by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:hammer_and_wrench: [disable custom picture  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/33abdf559a6e37227d2f7c6151aabdb4ceba28e4) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Use default keyboard for username input  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/14242a7877d30be062f48bfb3c0a27037f083d9d) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[9853] add missing translatable labels  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/81d2c35f4dc961156435b60a570694261a8c6449) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Fire request once network status changes & periodically check connection  This commit fixes a couple of issues.  The first one is that when we go from offline->cellular-network->wifi historical requests were not triggered (only when going from offline->online, but if they are disabled in cellular network they won't fire).  The second is due to the fact that it is possible that the connection status gets into a bad state, (this happens for example if get-latency returns all errors, but we are online, and it won't be retried), and no connection attempt is made anymore.  I have changed the logic to periodically check the connection state, and try to connect if too much time has passed since last error (10s), similarly to what we did before, but in a tick, so we are less reliant on having the right state in the db.  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/a8c39370d505f335ed6c155cecb8abe4915bef9e) by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
